text:
@ACTBrigitte @ladygaga calls a   corrupt man who endangered millions of people by covering up for China.
Dr Who a hero? Laughable. 
Is this low information woman crazy?
She needs to read more before she makes foolish statements.
#DrWho 
#WHOFailure 
#WuhanVirus
